study.name: Boston Digital Twin
study.Description: BPDA uses planning and shadow tools to create real-world visualizations for a wide variety of decision-making tasks including planning and development, flood modeling, shadow studies, and line-of-sight evaluation.
study.3D Platform Features: Flooding Modeling, Shadow Impact Analysis, Zoning Analysis
study.3D Platform to Physical City Control: Inform and analyze shadow casting; Zoning assistance tool
study.Decision Making: Potential growth in different services such as traffic
